main.doYouWantToOpenLink: Do you want to open the link in browser?

errors.ERROR_OPEN_TEXTURE_MAP: Failed to open the texture map file.
errors.ERROR_DECODE_COLORMAP: Failed to decode the colormap image.
errors.ERROR_NON_SQUARE_COLORMAP: The colormap image is not square.
errors.ERROR_READ_TILES: Failed to read tiles or no tiles found.
errors.ERROR_NO_TILE_FILES: The tiles folder contains no tile files.
errors.ERROR_INVALID_TILE_RESOLUTION: The tile resolution in the filename is invalid.
errors.ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_TILE_RESOLUTION: The tile resolution is not supported.
errors.ERROR_COLORMAP_RESOLUTION_MISMATCH: The colormap resolution does not match the expected resolution.
errors.ERROR_BACKUP_FAILED: Failed to create a backup of the tiles.
errors.ERROR_GET_PRESET_FOLDER: Failed to locate the preset folder.
errors.ERROR_MARSHAL_PRESET: Failed to process the preset data.

cutter.description:
A utility for working with tiles designed to slice maps and rename tiles into a format supported by RedKit.

In development.

foliage.description:
A utility for procedural generation and import of vegetation for RedKit.

In development.
